name: get_hebrew_month
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool enoch_calendar.
Tool description: Access the Biblical Holydays and Sabbaths using the Enoch Calendar
API description: Fetches the Hebrew month for a given Gregorian date string using the Enoch Calendar API.

datestring.description: The Gregorian date in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format for which to get the Hebrew month.
